_aChangeLog.text: Floor 2 hold is now 30 seconds, and added a new shortcut that opens after 15 seconds, after the wall breaks.
Floor 3 & 5 ZM Teleport will have the elevator doors close to avoid getting the zombies knocked back into the elevator.
Split path in Floor 3 is now 20 seconds from 10 seconds
Added a new teleport in Floor 3 that activates when split path has been triggered
Faded wall in Floor 3 from 15 seconds to 20 seconds. Teleport is still the same
Vent ZM Teleport in Floor 4 has been moved forward, and now includes a blocker to reduce travel distance.
Boss HP per human changed from 800 to 725
Boss State change for ground attacks is now 4. This means every 4 attacks on the ground the boss switches states to flying.
Boss Aggression damage nerfed from 30 to 25
Boss Icy Wind (Flying) attack is stronger
Crystal Item properly triggers the ending now.
Added decoration in some areas of the map

_sText:
This map is currently on Beta, I decided to release this early on GameBanana to have bugs and balance changes early on.
"On a snowy place abandoned 20 years ago, a skyscraper was left alone surrounded by hills of snow. Let us decide to have a goal, and reach the top of this snowy skyscraper."
Map by Pasas1345
Special Thanks to Hobbiten and 4Echo (Your lighting templates are too good)
Music List:
  • daniel.mp3 - dark snowy night (Floors 1-2)
  • WitchSpring R - Snow Field (Floors 3-4)
  • Serponge & TheDevon - Snowy Night (Floors 5-6)
  • Granblue Fantasy: Relink OST - Managarmr, Sequestrian Primal (Boss Phase 1 & 2)
Decided to try making an abandoned building a theme of a ZE map. Another one of my 1 stage defense maps. Hope you enjoy!

I do recommend playing this map with Map Sounds, HDR, Color Correction and Shake on, though you could disable those.
Includes
  • 1 Defense Map
  • 2 Endings
  • 1 Item (that has no effect when used)
  • 1 Boss
  • Snow
Hope you enjoy the map!
